Th  is is associated with foetal distress and can lead to death of the foetus because of an 
obstruction of the blood fl ow to the foetus from the placenta. 
/circle6 Th  e foetal outcome is poor in cases of prolapsed cord. Th e family should be counselled 
and the woman referred to the FRU as early as possible.
/circle6 When delivery is imminent, be prepared to resuscitate the newborn and also, to refer 
the woman and infant to the FRU.
